articles.title: Russia threatens to stop exporting energy to Europe; Ukraine claims advances in the east - Reuters.com
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin threatened to halt all energy shipments to Europe, if Brussels goes ahead with a proposal to cap the price of Russian gas, in a combative speech declaring Russia would not lose the war in Ukraine.
articles.content: KYIV, Sept 8 (Reuters) - Russian President Vladimir Putin threatened to halt all energy shipments to Europe, if Brussels goes ahead with a proposal to cap the price of Russian gas, in a combative spe… [+5972 chars]

articles.title: Intense Course Teaches Astronauts How to Be Scientists on the Moon - Gizmodo
articles.description: A pair of astronauts is set to receive geology training at different locations across Europe to prepare them for future trips to the Moon.
articles.content: Preparing for a trip to the Moon and knowing what to do once you get there are two completely different things. Thats why astronauts are partaking in an intensive course thatll help them to identify … [+3070 chars]

articles.description: A little over a decade on from the club’s ground-breaking European campaign, those at the heart of it explain how much things have changed for the Class of 2022.
articles.content:
